Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.media

Class SoundPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.media.SoundPool

  • public class SoundPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to sounds by name. Names are mapped to an arbitrary-length collection of sound resources. When retrieving from a name with multiple resource associations, a randomly-selected associated resource is returned.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SoundPool​()
      Constructs a new sound pool using the DEFAULT_CACHE_SIZE.
      SoundPool​(int cacheSize)
      Constructs a new sound pool using some cache size.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public javafx.scene.media.AudioClip get​(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a sound randomly selected from all resources associated with a name.
        Parameters:
        name - sound name
        Returns:
        randomly-selected sound associated with name
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no sounds associated with name

      • put

        public void put​(dev.kkorolyov.simpleprops.Properties soundConfig)
        Parses sounds from a configuration file. Each entry is a sound name mapped to an arbitrary-length list of resources, all with weight 1. If a resource does not contain //, it is assumed to be found on the local filesystem.
        Parameters:
        soundConfig - sound configuration file

      • put

        public void put​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String resource)
        Adds a name -> resource association with weight 1.
        Parameters:
        name - sound name
        resource - resource URL

      • put

        public void put​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String resource,
                int weight)
        Adds a name -> resource association.
        Parameters:
        name - sound name
        resource - resource URL
        weight - resource weight compared to other resources in the same distribution

      • getCacheSize

        public int getCacheSize​()
        Returns:
        maximum size of audio file cache

      • setCacheSize

        public void setCacheSize​(int cacheSize)
        Constrained >= 0. This method also clears the current audio clip cache.
        Parameters:
        cacheSize - new audio clip cache maximum size
